quote: I don't pave the way for people... people pave the way for me.
author: Harvey Specter

quote: I'm not about caring, I'm about winning.
author: Harvey Specter

quote: I'm against having emotions, not against using them.
author: Harvey Specter

quote: I don't play the odds, I play the man.
author: Harvey Specter

quote: When you're backed against the wall, break the goddamn thing down.
author: Harvey Specter

quote: The only time success comes before work is in the dictionary.
author: Harvey Specter

quote: I don't have dreams, I have goals.
author: Harvey Specter

quote: I could be drinking a juice box and still kick your ass.
author: Harvey Specter

quote: I'm not interested in great, I want to know who its Daddy is.
author: Harvey Specter

quote: Sometimes good guys gotta do bad things to make the bad guys pay.
author: Harvey Specter

quote: It's not bragging if it's true.
author: Harvey Specter

quote: You don't always have to let your superiors know what you are up to.
author: Jessica

quote: No sex of any kind. Weakens legs, clouds your judgment. Got it?
author: Louis Litt

quote: Which is why God made Chunky Monkey. It has chocolate, and bananas. Bananas are a part of a healthy breakfast. But who cares about the bananas? It has chocolate.
author: Donna

quote: I'm sorry, but my brain is too busy being awesome
author: Donna
